Minutes

There was a discussion on whether it makes sense to tag operations and inputs/outputs. Steve mentioned that in most cases that they have seen in the context of the embrace registry, there is one operation that does the 'task' of the service and other service management operations. Therefore only the tags associated with that 'functional' operation make sense beyond the context of that service. It make sense in the first instance to focus on tagging services and not necessarily operations and inputs/outputs. While there are cases where there are more than a single 'functional' operation within the service envelop, as seen in some DDBJ services, this seems to be the exception. In such cases, it is important to tag the different operations
